# init()

**Initializer**

Creates an empty drawing object.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

This initializer creates a new canvas object that doesn’t contain any data.

## Creating a drawing object

- **init(strokes:)**: Creates a drawing object and populates it with a sequence of strokes the user provides.
- **init(data:)**: Creates a drawing object and populates it with previously drawn content.
